org.ehcache.core.spi.service

Interface DiskResourceService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MaintainableService, PersistableResourceService, Service

    public interface DiskResourceService
extends PersistableResourceService
    Resource service handling file level operations for disk tiers.

      • createPersistenceContextWithin

        FileBasedPersistenceContext createPersistenceContextWithin(PersistableResourceService.PersistenceSpaceIdentifier<?> identifier,
                                                           java.lang.String name)
                                                    throws CachePersistenceException
        Creates a new persistence context within the given space.
        Parameters:

        name - name of the context to create
        Returns:
        a FileBasedPersistenceContext
